headline: All You Need to Know About Simon Property (SPG) Rating Upgrade to Buy
summary: Simon Property (SPG) has been upgraded to a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy), reflecting growing optimism about the company's earnings prospects. This might drive the stock higher in the near term.
